title: Football_Manager_2008_PROPER-FLT
description:
In Their 20th Year Of Glory, FairLight Released

Cracked by: FAIRLIGHT Game Type: Football 
Packaged by: FAIRLIGHT Image Format: BIN/CUE 
----- 
CDS: 1 Protection: Securom7+Custom 
CD1 archives: 42 x 15 MB CD1: flt-fm08.001 --> flt-fm08.042 


System Requirements: Intel Pentium 450 MHz, 128MB RAM, 32mb Graphics Card 


Game information:
=================

Football Manager returns before Christmas packed full of new features for
fans of the much-acclaimed series from Sports Interactive to feast their eyes
on. Football Manager 2008 is out on PC / Mac this autumn, and offers football
fans the chance to take on the greatest job on earth; manager of there
favourite football club!

Notes:
======

HATRED forgot to fix lots of triggers causing the game to have problems.

Just an example:

00F65D86 CALL DWORD PTR DS:[ ]
00F65D8C TEST EAX,EAX
00F65D8E JE 00F65D97
00F65D90 PUSH EAX
00F65D91 CALL DWORD PTR DS:[ ]
00F65D97 MOV EAX,1
00F65D9C JMP 00F65DA0

This is to our fallen soldier, youll never walk alone.

Installation Information:
=========================

Just extract the archives and burn/mount with your favorite software.
Install, copy our cracked content from CD to game dir then play.

/Team FairLight
